price: Ɔsoro bɛsunsuan asin-asin wͻ mu no? Nyankopͻn bͻhyε deε εyε hͻ.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
